title: Ticket #2926: condor_wait should have a option to echo the events to stdout
description:
condor_wait provides a convenient platform for stepping through the userlog reading code in the debugger, but since it doesn't print out the events as it sees them, it can't be used to automatically verify anything but completion.

If condor_wait could be told to write the events to stdout, the resulting output could be compared to the userlog itself to verify both correct reading and writing of events.
